page.title: 13Under Ground Cable Jointer
page.content: I interviewed Denis Limb he works at British Telecom he usually gets up at 6.45.His actual job is an underground cable jointer.He's been working there for fourteen years.He works with a group of four men when he travels and goes over twenty miles he goes by car and under twenty he goes by van.He works night shift and goes on courses. His position is a T1 which is a formans job.He has Saturday and Sunday off also every other Friday.Sometimes he works up a pole or in the exchange and outside.He wears overalls over his clothes and when he's up a pole he wears helmets and safety belts. He has to pay his bills the same as everyone else he doesn't get them cheaper.
